comments.body:
```suggestion
  "Failed_to_add_monitor": "The selected user is not a monitor",
```
I think we can improve it, it seems to be too technical to final users.
Maybe we can do something like we were doing on the old `Enterprise` version:
https://github.com/RocketChat/Rocket.Chat.Enterprise/blob/542717863ef8dd947f147d604d468b3befafb2ce/packages/rocketchat-enterprise-i18n/i18n/en.i18n.json#L36
they're not the same.. "Failed_to_add_monitor" is being used when an unknown error happens.. so I think it's fine

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +10,14 @@  "Edit_Unit": "Edit Unit",
  "Enterprise_License": "Enterprise License",
  "Failed_to_add_monitor": "Failed to add monitor",
  "Invalid Canned Response": "Invalid Canned Response",
  "Invalid_Department": "Invalid Department",
